methods.getChunkType:
Get the most suitable ChunkType for use with this ChunkSource.

:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.ChunkType) The ChunkType
methods.getShort:
Get a single short from this region.

*Overload 1*  
  :param elementIndex: (long) - Element (short) index in the table's address space
  :return: (short) The short value at the specified element (short) index
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param context: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.ChunkSource.FillContext) - A RegionContextHolder to enable resource caching where suitable, with current
                       region index pointing to this region
  :param elementIndex: (long) - Element (short) index in the table's address space
  :return: (short) The short value at the specified element (short) index

text: Column region interface for regions that support fetching primitive shorts.
